lessor.translation[0].definitions[0].def: someone who allows someone else to use their house, building, land etc for a period of time for payment
lessor.translation[1].definitions[0].def: someone who allows someone else to use their house, building, land etc for a period of time and in return receives payment
lessor.translation[1].definitions[0].exa: By renting property out to local businesses, the lessor benefits by obtaining tax deductions that would otherwise be unavailable.
